{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-N600.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N600 Dual-Band Router |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N600/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-N600 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RT-N600 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |type = wireless router, access point |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RT1D00 |icid = 3568A-RT1D00 |us_id = |boardid = AP-MT0E-3DC6 |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628AN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = V5.5 |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS,ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = T&W |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan (+ac) |availability = only for US/CA |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01BI8MAV4 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP-MT0E-3DC6" and "REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|ASUS RT-AC1200|ASUS RT-N300 B1}} *FCC ID: [https://fcc.io/MSQ/-RT1D00 MSQ-RT1D00] ([[ASUS RT-AC1200]] / '''ASUS RT-N600''') :All models are electrically identical, different model names are for marketing purpose. {{FCC ST|11/25/2015}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-rt-ac1200hp-rt-ac56s-rt-n56u-v2-wireless-router.22328/ On '''SNB''' forums] (RTN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62648-89#3317 On '''iXBT''' forums] (Padavan) :*ASUS RT-N600 - [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N600/ PPage] ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz WiSoC (2T2R 802.11bgn) ::WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN (2T2R 802.11an -> '''802.11an/ac''' !!) ::RAM: 64MB (DDR2), Flash 16MB (SPI, 16-pin), USB 2.0 :*[[ASUS RT-AC1200]] - [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-AC1200/ PPage] ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz WiSoC (2T2R 802.11bgn) ::WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN (2T2R '''802.11an/ac''' !!) ::RAM: 64MB (DDR2), Flash 16MB (SPI, 16-pin), USB 2.0 ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===OpenWrt=== *https://github.com/russinnes/ASUS-RT-N600-OpenWRT :Current build of OpenWRT (22.03) :Upgrade using the Asus Firmware Restore Tool (download from Asus) : {This build will be merged with the OpenWRT master repo on Github once the pull is merged} *https://github.com/russinnes/RT-N600-Padavan :Powerful with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} Firmware, Entware/Optware :enabled USB storage allows full Linux operation. {{SCollapse|[https://github.com/russinnes/rt-n56u/commit/e55f05175867e50173efe7c77984f51245573340 ''Add ASUS RT-N600 board profiles''] â€¢ >> |[https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u/src/master/trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/ ASUS RT-AC1200 board profiles] 
trunk/configs/boards/RT-N600/board.h

/* ASUS RT-N600 */

#define BOARD_PID		"RT-N600"
#define BOARD_NAME		"RT-N600"
#define BOARD_DESC		"ASUS RT-N600 Wireless Router"
#define BOARD_VENDOR_NAME	"ASUSTek Computer Inc."
#define BOARD_VENDOR_URL	"http://www.asus.com/"
#define BOARD_MODEL_URL		"http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N600/"
#define BOARD_BOOT_TIME		25
#define BOARD_FLASH_TIME	120
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_RESET	5
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_WPS	11
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_ALL	4
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WIFI
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_POWER	37
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_LAN
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_USB	6
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ROUTER
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB
#define BOARD_HAS_5G_11AC	1
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ETH_LEDS	1
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_L1000	0
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_W1000	0

trunk/configs/boards/RT-N600/board.mk

##################################################################
# Board PID   # Board Name        # PRODUCT # Note
##################################################################
# RT-N600   # ASUS RT-N600    # MT7628  #
##################################################################

CFLAGS += -DBOARD_AC1200 -DVENDOR_ASUS
BOARD_NUM_USB_PORTS=1
}} {Flash using the Asus Firmware Recovery tool. Follow the instructions that come with the tool (Wired connection manual IP of 192.168.1.2+} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:n600-board-uart.jpg|Main board
